tool.name: show_shape_space
tool.description: Displays a visual representation of the shape space from a trained 2D diffeomorphic model.
tool.help:
**Description**
The 2D Shape Space tool creates a visualization of the shape space from a trained 2D diffeomorphic model.
-----
**Inputs**
- Trained 2D Diffeomorphic Model - Number of Labels - Image Subsize
-----
**Output**
- A PNG (.png) file of the shape space
-----
**Example**
The 2D shape space tool displays the following image using a trained 2D diffemorphic model and the default parameters:
.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/dev/tools/cellorganizer/images/shape_space.png :height: 250 :target: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/dev/tools/cellorganizer/images/shape_space.png
